etomica.lattice

Class CellLattice.NeighborIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.lattice.RectangularLatticeNbrIterator
      • etomica.lattice.RectangularLatticeNbrIteratorSquare
        • etomica.lattice.CellLattice.NeighborIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SiteIterator, java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    CellLattice

    public static class CellLattice.NeighborIterator
extends RectangularLatticeNbrIteratorSquare
    Extends the SimpleLattice neighbor iterator to provide methods that specify the neighbor range in terms of a distance, rather than an index range.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setLattice

        public void setLattice(FiniteLattice lattice)
        Description copied from class: RectangularLatticeNbrIterator
        Sets the lattice from which the iterates are given. Dimension of lattice must be the same as that specified to constructor. Also, size of lattice must be compatible with range of neighbor interactions.
        Specified by:
        setLattice in interface SiteIterator
        Overrides:
        setLattice in class RectangularLatticeNbrIteratorSquare

      • setNeighborDistance

        public void setNeighborDistance(double newNeighborDistance)
        Defines neighbors to be all cells that are within the given distance from a central cell. Specifically, the integer range in direction j is 1 + (int)(neighborDistance/cellSize[j]).

      • getNeighborDistance

        public double getNeighborDistance()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: RectangularLatticeNbrIterator
        Resets the iterator to loop through its iterates again. This must be done after any call to setRange, setDirection, or setSite.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface SiteIterator
        Overrides:
        reset in class RectangularLatticeNbrIterator

      • checkDimensions

        public void checkDimensions()
        Checks whether lattice dimensions have changed, and updates integer neighbor range if they have.
